messages.content: You are AeroAI ATC.

{"controller_role": "DELIVERY", "callsign": "BAW123", "dep_runway": "RW27L", "destination": "EGLL", "sid": "CPT3F", "squawk": "4521", "initial_altitude_ft": 6000}
PILOT: Delivery, Speedbird one two three, request IFR clearance
Speedbird one two three, cleared to Heathrow via CPT three Foxtrot departure, runway two seven left, climb initially six thousand feet, squawk four five two one.
You are AeroAI ATC.

{"controller_role": "DELIVERY", "callsign": "EZY456", "dep_runway": "RW09R", "destination": "LFPG", "sid": "DET2F", "squawk": "7234", "initial_altitude_ft": 5000}
PILOT: Easy four five six, clearance request
Easy four five six, cleared to Paris Charles de Gaulle via DET two Foxtrot departure, runway zero niner right, climb initially five thousand feet, squawk seven two three four.
You are AeroAI ATC.

{"controller_role": "TOWER", "callsign": "RYR789", "dep_runway": "RW24"}
PILOT: Ryanair seven eight niner, ready for departure
Ryanair seven eight niner, runway two four, cleared for takeoff, wind two three zero degrees eight knots.
You are AeroAI ATC.

{"controller_role": "APPROACH", "callsign": "DLH901", "arr_runway": "RW28L", "cleared_altitude_ft": 3000}
PILOT: Lufthansa niner zero one, with you descending
Lufthansa niner zero one, radar contact, descend three thousand feet, expect ILS runway two eight left.
You are AeroAI ATC.

{"controller_role": "TOWER", "callsign": "UAE555", "arr_runway": "RW30R"}
PILOT: Emirates five five five, final runway three zero right
Emirates five five five, runway three zero right, cleared to land, wind three two zero degrees twelve knots.
You are AeroAI ATC.

{"controller_role": "DELIVERY", "callsign": "SWR234", "cruise_level": "FL350", "dep_runway": "RW16", "destination": "LSZH", "sid": "BUZAD1G", "squawk": "5612", "initial_altitude_ft": 5000}
PILOT: Swiss two three four, IFR to Zurich, flight level three five zero
Swiss two three four, cleared to Zurich, flight level three five zero, BUZAD one Golf departure, runway one six, climb initially five thousand feet, squawk five six one two.
You are AeroAI ATC.

{"controller_role": "GROUND", "callsign": "AFR678", "dep_runway": "RW08L"}
PILOT: Air France six seven eight, request taxi
Air France six seven eight, taxi to holding point runway zero eight left via Alpha, Bravo.
You are AeroAI ATC.

{"controller_role": "DEPARTURE", "callsign": "THY321", "cleared_altitude_ft": 15000, "cruise_level": "FL370"}
PILOT: Turkish three two one, passing eight thousand climbing
Turkish three two one, climb flight level three seven zero.
You are AeroAI ATC.

{"controller_role": "CENTER", "callsign": "QTR999", "cruise_level": "FL410"}
PILOT: Qatar niner niner niner, level flight level four one zero
Qatar niner niner niner, radar contact, maintain flight level four one zero.
You are AeroAI ATC.

{"controller_role": "APPROACH", "callsign": "SAS147", "arr_runway": "RW04R", "cleared_heading_deg": 090}
PILOT: Scandinavian one four seven, request vectors
Scandinavian one four seven, turn right heading zero niner zero, vectors ILS runway zero four right.
